arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim confirms bitter Man Utd injury blow for Lyon game: ‘He will be out’
arts.sum: Manchester United were thrashed 4-1 by Newcastle in the Premier League on Sunday - and their result was made even worse by a suspected hamstring injury for Joshua Zirkzee

arts.ttl: Man United head coach Ruben Amorim issues Joshua Zirkzee injury update ahead of Lyon battle
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim issues a Joshua Zirkzee injury update ahead of Thursday's Europa League quarter-final second leg against Lyon.

arts.ttl: Man United injury news: Red Devils suffer bitter blow ahead of Lyon showdown in Europa League
arts.sum: Manchester United forward Joshua Zirkzee suffers an injury during Sunday's Premier League clash with Newcastle United at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim drops Man United star from the squad to face Newcastle after what happened vs Lyon
arts.sum: Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana has been dropped from the Man United squad to face Newcastle. This comes after his horrible performance against Lyon in the midweek, where he was responsible for both the goal United conceded during the 2-2 draw in the Europa League. The first goal was conceded from a needless free-kick given […] The post Ruben Amorim drops Man United star from the squad to face Newcastle after what happened vs Lyon appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Andre Onana 'rested' for Newcastle match, but will Man United number one return against Lyon?
arts.sum: Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana will allegedly not be involved in Sunday's Premier League clash with Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: Andre Onana DROPPED for Man Utd's trip to Newcastle after Lyon horror show
arts.sum: Andre Onana will not be in goal when Manchester United face Newcastle at St James' Park on Sunday having not travelled with the team to Tyneside following his difficult spell

arts.ttl: Nemanja Matić set to leave Lyon at the end of his contract
